visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly average temperatures for a year. Additionally, the chart should have custom colors and include a plot band highlighting a specific range on the x-axis. The chart should also have a button that removes the plot band when clicked.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes a data series representing monthly average temperatures for a year. The x-axis is labeled with month names, and the y-axis is labeled with 'Temperature (°C)'. The axes and labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes. A plot band is added to the x-axis to highlight a specific range (from May to July). The chart also includes a custom color for the data series and markers. Additionally, the chart is configured to have a legend and a button that removes the plot band when clicked. The background color of the chart is set to a light gray for better readability.
